title: FiveThirtyEight - Wikipedia
snippet: FiveThirtyEight won numerous awards, including Bloggie Awards for Best Political Coverage in 2008 and Best Weblog about Politics in 2009 as well as Webbies for Best Political Blog in 2012 and 2013. title: FiveThirtyEight - Ownership and Business Overview | Mergr
snippet: Who owns FiveThirtyEight? FiveThirtyEight is owned by ABC News. It was acquired on April 18, 2018.
